title: Carbohydrate Revolutions, Baking Soda Supplements, and More: How Pro Cycling Got Faster in 2023
content:
Velo's 'Behind the Ride' series digs into the performance practices that power the pro peloton. Here are some of our favorite features of the year.

Read the full article at Carbohydrate Revolutions, Baking Soda Supplements, and More: How Pro Cycling Got Faster in 2023 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
